department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology
department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班

goal.en: The objectives of this course are to introduce the development of the field of Technology Enhanced Language Learning, to discuss the design principle of Technology Enhanced Language Learning, and to implement a Technology Enhanced Language Learning system.
goal.ch: 本課程的目標主要包含: 了解數位語言學習系統研究領域的發展, 探討數位語言學習系統的相關設計原則, 並實際開發一個數位語言學習系統.

content.en: The course includes: Lecture, Group discussion, and Group presentations (group project proposal, system exploration, group project final presentations).
content.ch: 本課程授課方式包含: 講課, 小組討論, 小組簡報(期末專題提案, 系統分析, 及期末系統展示)等.

method.ch: 講授 個別指導 其他

grading.en: Group discussion (every week): 20％ Group project proposal presentation: 15％ System exploration presentation: 15％ Group project final presentation: 30％ Peer evaluation: 10％ Attendance: 10％
grading.ch: Group discussion (every week): 20％ Group project proposal presentation: 15％ System exploration presentation: 15％ Group project final presentation: 30％ Peer evaluation: 10％ Attendance: 10％
